content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1-4, y=1-4)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Stone furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter at (1.5,2.5) and output chest at (1.5,3.5)
- Stone furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter at (3.5,2.5) and output chest at (3.5,3.5)
Both setups are actively smelting iron ore with coal as fuel

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2-5, y=7-10)
Consists of two parallel smelting setups:
- Stone furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter at (2.5,8.5) and output chest at (2.5,9.5)
- Stone furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter at (4.5,8.5) and output chest at (4.5,9.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (3.5,9.5) connecting the two lines
Currently idle due to no ingredients

### Transport Belt Network (x=2.5-13.5, y=8.5-16.5)
Multiple interconnected belt groups forming a logistics network:
- East-west belt connection from (2.5,8.5) to (4.5,8.5)
- Extended belt network from (4.5,8.5) to (13.5,10.5)
- North-south belt connections at multiple points
All belts currently empty

### Assembly Line Setup (x=14.5-21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Two assembly machines with supporting infrastructure:
- Copper cable assembler at (14.5,14.5) with input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Electronic circuit assembler at (21.5,15.5) with input chest at (21.5,11.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for material handling
Currently not operating due to lack of power

### Power Generation System (x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Complete but non-functioning power setup:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) producing water
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5) connected via pipes but lacking fuel
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5) not receiving steam
- Pipe network connecting components with water present in initial sections

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has fuel (coal) to heat water
- Complete pipe connections between boiler and steam engine to allow steam flow

### Assembly Machine Issues
- Connect power to assembly machines before attempting production
- Ensure proper material input supply chains are established before starting production

### Resource Management
- Verify required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items
- Check recipe requirements and ensure sufficient materials are in inventory

### Entity Placement
- Ensure proper connections between fluid-carrying entities (pipes, boilers, pumps)
- Verify transport belt connections are properly aligned and connected
